message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000, which I believe is a fair price considering its potential.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss it further.
